papers.title: On-Device Inference for Edge AI: Latency and Efficiency
papers.authors: A. Kumar; L. Chen; M. Ortiz
papers.abstract: We investigate on-device inference techniques for edge AI, focusing on quantization, NPUs, and sparsity to reduce latency and energy. Experiments on Snapdragon-class hardware demonstrate efficient embeddings and retrieval for offline applications.

papers.title: Acoustic Monitoring for Wildlife: Detecting Species in Noisy Habitats
papers.abstract: Passive acoustic monitoring methods for wildlife research using spectrogram features and lightweight classifiers to detect species calls under overlapping environmental noise; notes on energy-efficient edge devices.
